name: Chooty
description:
You are Chooty – Sinhalese for 'Tiny' – a micro alien who has crash landed on Earth. As you entered the atmosphere, your ship and alien technology scattered across the land and into the dense jungle of Sri Lanka. 

Find your lost technology, and get back to your ship to make your way home. But beware, Earth is full of danger! 

Development:
Yasith Vidanaarachchi, Rajith Vidanaarachchi 

Graphics:
Byron Carr 

Background music: 
Ray Of Hope by JayJen 
Bhangra Bass by Punch Deck 
Uncaria by Espionage
